item.title: Audit Readiness Made Simple — Show Numbers, Not Narratives
item.description:
Audits often come down to one big question: Can you demonstrate improvement?
Most shop floors struggle here — safety logs are inconsistent, and human observation is unreliable over long periods.

AISee changes that.
Every deviation is logged automatically, along with time-stamped images and compliance percentages.
When an auditor asks, you don’t show manual registers — you show data, charts, and trends.

Benefits

  • Real-time, quantitative evidence for safety compliance
  • Automatic monthly and quarterly summaries
  • Visual proof of CAPA (Corrective and Preventive Actions) effectiveness

item.title: The AI Solution to Quality Control Crisis in Manufacturing SMEs
item.description:
The Future of Visual Inspection is Here

Imagine this: a new operator walks onto your factory floor and begins performing complex visual inspections with the precision of a seasoned quality engineer. This isn’t science fiction—it’s real, thanks to AI-powered visual inspection.

At AICUE Data Lab, we created VISPECT to address one of the most persistent challenges in manufacturing: maintaining consistent, high-quality inspection despite a shortage of skilled labor and increasing product complexity.
